scripts.install:deps: uv sync --extra dev && uv pip install -e ../db
scripts.dev: npx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env -- bash -c 'uv run uvicorn src.main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port "${API_PORT:-8000}"'
scripts.start: npx dotenv-cli -e ../../.env -- bash -c 'uv run uvicorn src.main:app --host 0.0.0.0 --port "${API_PORT:-8000}"'
scripts.format: uv run ruff format . && uv run ruff check . --fix
scripts.format:check: uv run ruff format . --check && uv run ruff check .
scripts.check: pnpm format:check && pnpm lint && pnpm type-check
